subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Kentucky’s defense looked plenty capable of carrying the Wildcats until the offense caught up. Ashton Cobb returned a Louisville fumble 28 yards for a touchdown and Myron Pryor returned another fumble 72 yards for a score as the Wildcats defeated Louisville, 27-2, in the Governor’s Cup on Sunday in Louisville. Tony Dixon added a 7-yard touchdown run for the Wildcats, who have won two in a row against their rivals for the first time in a decade.
